sentence: Last month, Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger, state Sen. Chuck Edwards.
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having a gun at Charlotte airport

sentence: Tillis threw his support behind Cawthorn's primary challenger, North Carolina state senator Chuck Edwards, in the aftermath of the cocaine? and orgy? controversy.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Madison Cawthorn Keeps Getting Implicated in Possible Crimes
